name: polymer with 2-propenamide
C16-18-alkyl ethers
FoodContactSubstance: Ethanaminium, N,N,N-trimethyl-2-[(1-oxo-2-propen-1-yl)oxy]-, chloride (1:1), polymer with 2-propenamide (CAS Reg. No. 69418-26-4) with up to 0.06 mol % of poly(oxy-1,2-ethanediyl), alpha-(2-methyl-1-oxo-2-propen-1-yl)-omega-hydroxy-, C16-18-alkyl ethers (CAS Reg. No. 70879-51-5).
